title: 20-Minute Beginner Yoga Routine | Gentle Flow With Blocks
description:
Join me for this 20-minute beginner yoga routine, designed to help you ease into your practice and build a strong foundation. Each pose is held for 3-5 breaths, giving you time to settle into your body, feel the stretch, and enjoy the flow. We'll be using two yoga blocks throughout the class to support your alignment and increase flexibility. If you don’t have yoga blocks, no worries! You can use books or water bottles as an alternative. Whether you're brand new to yoga or looking to refine your practice, this session is perfect for you!

Grab your mat and two blocks, and let's get started on this gentle, relaxing routine!

If you enjoyed flowing with me and want to see more videos like this, please like, comment, and share with friends and family! 🫶🏻

Thank you for choosing to flow with me! 🤍

With love and gratitude, 

Audrey 

#beginneryogapractice #beginneryoga #yogaforbeginners #20minuteyoga #yogaroutine

channelDescription:

On this channel, I share yoga and sound healing classes for all levels (sound baths coming soon!). Embrace growth, balance, and self-care through these powerful practices.
